abstract: San Diego Gas and Electric and its wholly owned subsidiary New Albion Resources Co. have been affiliated with Magma Power Company, Magma Energy Inc. and Chevron Oil Company for the last 2-1/2 years in carrying out geothermal research and development in the private lands of the Imperial Valley. The steps undertaken in the program are reviewed and the sequence that must be considered by companies considering geothermal research and development is emphasized. Activities at the south end of the Salton Sea and in the Heber area of Imperial Valley are leading toward development of demonstration facilities within the near future. The current status of the project is reported.
title: San Diego Gas and Electric Company Imperial Valley geothermal activities

organization.name: San Diego Gas and Electric Co.

publications.publicationName: JPL  Proc. of the Conf. on Res. for the Develop. of Geothermal Energy Resources

related.title: Proceedings of the Conference on Research for the Development of Geothermal Energy Resources
